title: Is the vayne buff on the pbe a fucking joke?
body:
I guess the riot balance team has a fetish for uncounterable stealth mechanics. 1 second cooldown on a stealth that is also a damage steroid is laughably overpowered.
Yet again this is the same balance team that thinks akali's shroud giving immunity to turrets is fine.

why on earth would a viegar have a randuins, Viegar CAN and WILL press R on a vayne (assuming this is late game where she is the problem and can almost 1 shot) and she will die, and bringing up what they may build or not build, thats just subjective to a point of trying to make an argument like that. and wont work cause who goign to die to vieg  R only if they stack MR.

Vayne cannot die out of a single veigar R. Vayne can outplay veigar, veigar can't outplay vayne. 

Lvl 18 vayne has 

2028 HP and 38,5 MR, assuming vayne is full offensive and has no single rune or item reducing incoming damages, and assuming veigar is full build with a morello and sorceres boots

A full build veigar will have enough pen to reduce vayne's MR to 0.
Veigar ult on a 100% hp target deals :
325 (+ 75% AP)

So in order to deal 2028 damages, veigar will need :
( 2028 - 325 ) / 0,75 = 2270 AP

So it's clearly impossible that veigar can build this much AP.

(Note most vayne have mercurial AND PhD when full build so they have more MR and more damage reduction than I took in my example).

Yay someone with numbers! 
Are you including ludens, which they would 100% have, and can we do an average amount of AP a vieg would have in a late game both full build scenario?

To be honnest a lot of veigar plays GLP rather than luden. Yet luden need to be charged.

So let's still take an ideal scenario where veigar use luden : luden deals 100 + 10% AP

Veigar ult damages deals 1,5% more damage per 1% hp missing for the target.

https://i.imgur.com/58mA78C.png

The breakpoint is at 1650 AP

I Otp veigar. I never reached such a high level of ap in my life in a fair ranked game (not talking about when I climb with a smurf and make the won game last on purpose to stack ap).

I reach full build one game out of 5, but I rarely get full damages, I often get a single defensive item. (That would be stupid to be fed just to get deleted by the ennemy Vi or nocturne without any chance to even cast a spell).

When i'm over fed and full stuff i'll be at 1200-1400 AP (happens one game out of 20) maybe)

Never have I ever seen a vayne not buying at least an MR item when facing a fed veigar. 

So we can theorycraft all day long, but at the end of the day, veigar never deletes anyone with R only anymore.

Would it be fair to say it just depends on the players then?  Cause i play AD, And i've played viegar alot when i played mid, and i have been 100-0'd by viegars R easily, it even feels worse when ahead then suddenly you dont play the game anymore.

Wasnt it back in seasons 5 and before when veigar ult was not a finisher and was an anti-mage scaling on opponent ap as well ?

The maths here can't be denied. But remember that we are talking about a 100% health vayne. If you have 50%hp as a squishy a veigar with 1000 ap will execute you. 

Veigar has clear strenght but also clear weaknesses. Many kits totaly invalidate his.

But nowadays games are so quick we do not have a lot of full build 1400+ ap veigar.
His R does more damage the less health the enemy has.  It does pretty low damage to a full health enemy actually.
Late game on squishy Q+R = dead, and since R is not skillshot, you basically kill someone in a single skillshot
